title: Tapping At the Ballpark loads list of teams and stadium names - verify new logo is updated and ballpark name reads Minute Maid Park
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and the user's location is not set to be near Minute Maid Park
custom_steps: When the user scrolls down to Minute Maid Park
custom_expected: Then The user should see the updated logo to the left of the name of the ballpark

title: Updated logo is present when the ballpark is nearby
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and the user has set their location to be at Minute Maid Ballpark
custom_steps:
When the list of ballparks re-loads
and Minute Maid Park is found to be a nearby ballpark
custom_expected:
Then the user will see that the updated logo is present
and the logo is not the previous logo

title: On Stadium page - Verifiy header colors are updated to match that of the new logo (verify with Chris Bestwick)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
custom_steps: When the ballpark page opens
custom_expected:
Then the team's header color should be correct

Information: 
RGB: 235, 99, 31
RBG %: .91, .39, .18

title: Game Details Page Logo
custom_preconds:
Given The user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and the user has selected Minute Maid Park
and their is a game being played at Minute Maid Park on this date
custom_steps:
When the user clicks on the Game Details button
and the Event Detail page opens
custom_expected: Then the user should see the updated Houston Astros Logo astro on the right side if the matchup information

title: Logo on top of Ballpark image
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and the user has selected Minute Maid Park
custom_steps: When the page loads
custom_expected: Then the user should see the updated Houston Astros logo in the lower left corner of the ballpark image on the upper portion of the screen.

title: Game Details Page Logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed ATB
and the user has opened the app
and the user has clicked on a stadium that has a game at the ballpark
and this game is the Houston Astros vs a home team
and the home team is not the Houston Astros
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the Game Details Button
custom_expected:
Then the Event detail screen will load
and the updated Houston Astros logo should be present on the left side of the game matchup information

title: My Profile page - Favorite Teams - tapping the Favorite Teams cell should bring user to a list of teams with the updated team logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and the user has clicked on a ballpark
and the user has clicked the my profile button
and the user logs in
custom_steps: When the user clicks on Favorite Teams
custom_expected: Then The user should see the updated Houston Astros logo

title: My Profile page - Verify a user that unlocked the Minute Maid Park badge still shows that badge in the 'Ballparks' section
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has clicked on a ballpark
and the user clicks on the My Profile icon
and the user logs in with an account that has checked into Minute Maid Park sometime prior to the change in logo/league
custom_steps: When the user clicks on Ballparks
custom_expected: Then The user should see the Minute Maid Park stadium badge unlocked

title: My Profile Page - Attended filter - team logos should show new logo for all previously attended games at Minute Maid Park
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has clicked on a ballpark
and the user has clicked on the my profile icon in the upper left corner
and the user logs in with an account that has checked into Minute Maid Park prior to the Houston Astros League/Logo changes
custom_steps: When the user clicks on on the Attended Button
custom_expected:
Then The user will see both the Houston home and away logos as their new logo. 
and the user will NOT see the Houston Astros' old logo

title: My Profile Page - Teams filter - team logo and name should be updated with new team logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has openend the app
and the user has clicked on a ballpark from the list of ballparks
and the user has clicked the my profile button in the upper left corner
and the user has logged in with an account that has checked into at least one Houston Astros Game prior to the logo/league changes
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the teams button
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the updated Houston Astros logo 
and will not see any old Houston Astros logos

title: My Profile Page - Attended Filter - team logos should show new logo for all previously attended games where the Astros were the away team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has clicked on a ballpark
and the user has clicked on the my profile icon in the upper left corner
and has checked into a ballpark where the Houston Astros were the away team prior to the Houston Astros League/Logo changes
custom_steps: When the user clicks on on the Attended Button
custom_expected:
Then The user will see both the Houston home and away logos as their new logo. 
and the user will NOT see the Houston Astros' old logo

title: My Profile Page  - Unlocking Minute Maid badge
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed ATB
and the user has opened the app
and the user has clicked on the Minute Maid Park page
and there is a home game being played at Minute Maid Park on that day
and the user's device is set to be at that ballpark
and the check-in window is set to allow checkins at that time
custom_steps:
When the user clicks to check in to the game
and the user logs in with an account that has not been checked-in to at Minute Maid Park yet
and the user clicks check in
and the user clicks my profile
and the user clicks on Ballparks
custom_expected: Then the user will see the Minute Maid Ballpark badge unlocked

title: My Profile Page - Attended Games Houston is home
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and their is a game at Minute Maid Park for the day the device is set to
and the time is within the check-in window
and the user has signed into an account that has not checked into Minute Maid Park yet
and the user has clicked on Minute Maid Park
and the user has clicked check-in
and the user clicks check-in
and the user clicks go to my profile
custom_steps: When the user clicks Attended
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the cell with game information for the game they just checked in to
and the Houston Astros logo should be on the right hand side of the cell
and this logo should be the updated logo

title: My Profile Page - Attended Games Houston is Away
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and their is a game at a ballpark that would make the Astros the away team for the day the device is set to
and the time is within the check-in window
and the user has signed into an account that has not checked into a Houston Astros away game
and the user has clicked on the ballpark with the game being played
and the user has clicked check-in
and the user clicks check-in
and the user clicks go to my profile
custom_steps: When the user clicks Attended
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a cell of the game they just checked in to
and the left hand of the cell should show the updated Houston Astros logo

title: My Profile Page - Teams - Houston is away
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and their is a game at Minute Maid Park for the day the device is set to
and the time is within the check-in window
and the user has signed into an account that has not checked into a Houston Astros home or away game yet
and the user has clicked check-in
and the user clicks check-in
and the user clicks go to my profile
custom_steps: When the user clicks Teams
custom_expected:
Then the user should see a new cell 
and this cell should say Astros
and the new Astros logo should be present

title: My Profile Page  - Teams - Houston is home
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the app
and their is a game to the ballpark where the Houston Astros will be playing an away game for the day the device is set to
and the time is within the check-in window
and the user has signed into an account that has not checked into a Houston Astros home or away game yet
and the user has clicked check-in
and the user clicks check-in
and the user clicks go to my profile
custom_steps: When the user clicks teams
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a cell under teams
and this cell will say 'Astros'
and the updated Houston Astros logo will be there

title: Back Button on check-in screen when the user's device is within an acceptable distance of Minute Maid Park
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the application
and their is a game at Minute Maid park for the date the device is set to
and the users' device time is set to a time that will allow check-ins to the ballpark
and the check-in service is set to allow check-ins
and the user's device is set to be within an acceptable distance to allow a check-in to Minute Maid Park
custom_steps:
When the user clicks check-in
and the page loads
custom_expected: Then the user should see a back arrow with the updated Houston Astros Logo to the left of the word 'Check-in'

title: Back button on check-in screen when the user's device is not within an acceptable distance of Minute Maid Park
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At the Ballpark
and the user has opened the application
and their is a game at Minute Maid park for the date the device is set to
and the users' device time is set to a time that will allow check-ins to the ballpark
and the check-in service is set to allow check-ins
and the user's device is NOT set to be within an acceptable distance to allow a check-in to Minute Maid Park
custom_steps:
When the user clicks check-in
and the page loads
custom_expected: Then the user should see a back arrow with the updated Houston Astros Logo to the left of the word 'Check-in'

title: Back button on Minute Maid Park Home Game
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At The Ballpark
and the user has opened the application
and the user has clicked on a ballpark from the list of ballparks
and the user has clicked on my profile in the upper right corner
and the user logs in to an account that has checked in to at least one Houston Astros Home Game
custom_steps:
When the user clicks on <Number> Games
and clicks on the game cell for a Houston Astros Home Game
and the user clicks on View Game Wrap
custom_expected: Then the back button will show the Houston Astros updated logo

title: Back button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed ATB
and the user has clicked on Minute Maid Park
custom_steps: When the user clicks on a menu item
custom_expected:
Then the back button will show a picture of the updated Houston Astros Logo

Repeat for all menu items.

title: Back Button
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed ATB
and the user has clicked Minute Maid Park
and the user has clicked on Game details
custom_steps: When the user clicks on a link on the Game Details page (Check- in) or Tickets
custom_expected: Then the user should see the updated Houston Astros logo as the back button

title: Back button on offer
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed ATB
and the user has clicked on Minute Maid Park
and the user has clicked on Game Details
and there is an offer for this game
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the offer
custom_expected: Then the user should see the updated Houston Astros logo as the back button

title: Back button on promotion
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed ATB
and the user has clicked on Minute Maid Park
and the user has clicked on Game details
and there is a promotion for this game
custom_steps: When the user clicks on the promotion
custom_expected: Then the user should see the updated Houston Astros logo as the back button

title: Back button on view more tweets
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed At Bat
and the user has clicked on Minute Maid Park
and the user has clicked on Game Details
custom_steps: When the user clicks on view more tweets
custom_expected: Then the user should see the updated Houston Astros logo as the back button
